sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create a Contract task to prepare the Contract for approval.

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^priority={{Created or Updated_1.current.priority}}^description=Please ContractSync Fulfillers, prepare the {{959446a9-1ba3-48f0-a313-d79c5d9ef057.record.u_dependent.name}} Contract for approval by {{fd_transform:4d0bccea-71dc-457a-b23f-8211cbd1c1cb}} with a Priority: {{Created or Updated_1.current.priority}}. Examine the parent for more details.^assignment_group={"display":"ContractSync Fulfillers","value":"8b03134d9f7302107f4489554524abdb","sys_id":"8b03134d9f7302107f4489554524abdb"}^state=1^short_description=Prepare Contract for approval^due_date={{fd_transform:829287d4-d422-4af2-a0c6-8f8dfc595dc2}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait for Contract request state is In progress.
Update Contract state to ready for approval and bind Contract Request to relative current Contract record.
Create Contract record with Contract request data and active = false.

sys_element_mapping.value: u_dependent={{Created or Updated_1.current.requested_for}}^u_contract_type={{Created or Updated_1.current.u_contract_type}}^u_start_date={{Created or Updated_1.current.u_start_date}}^u_end_date={{Created or Updated_1.current.u_end_date}}^u_automatic_renewal={{Created or Updated_1.current.u_automatic_renewal}}^u_configuration_items={{Created or Updated_1.current.u_configuration_items}}^u_active=false^=

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Log (INFO) that the Contract was activated.
Update Configuratiom item Reserved to true.
Bind Contract Request and relative Approval.
Log (ERROR) that an error was occurred.
Get current Approval record.
Make Contract active = true.
Update Contract state to Closed incomplete.
Notificate the Requester that the Contract request is approved and completed.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 3 - Create Record➛...➛First name,

Your 3 - Create Record➛...➛Contract type Contract is successfully approved by your Manager 3 - Create Record➛...➛Name and Flow Variables➛Reviewers name.

Your  Contract will start by: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Start date and will end by 3 - Create Record➛...➛End date.

 

Other Contract informations:  

Automatic renewal present: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Automatic renewal

Configuration items provided: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Configuration items

 

If your Contract provide Configuration Items then you will receive an email with their credentials.

 

 Best regards, Flow Variables➛Service desk name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Contract State to Closed complete.
Notificate the Requester that the Contract request is rejected.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2 - Create Record➛...➛First name,

Unfortunately your 2 - Create Record➛...➛Contract type Contract is rejected by your Manager 2 - Create Record➛...➛Name or Flow Variables➛Reviewers name.

 

 Your Contract maybe still be approved in the future.

 

Best regards, Flow Variables➛Service desk name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ask for approval to Contract Reviewer Group and Dependent Manager.
Send an Email with Error Code and Message to the ContractSync Admin group and ContractSync Creator.

sys_variable_value.value:
Contract Request fulfillment flow ERROR:

  • Code: 15 - Top Level Catch➛...➛Code
  • Message: 15➛...➛Message
An ERROR occurred in Contract Request fulfillment flow

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: For each Configuration item provided in the Contract...
Else if Approval is not approved...

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^priority={{Created or Updated_1.current.priority}}^description=Please ContractSync Fulfillers, prepare the {{959446a9-1ba3-48f0-a313-d79c5d9ef057.record.u_dependent.name}} Contract for approval by {{fd_transform:4d0bccea-71dc-457a-b23f-8211cbd1c1cb}} with a Priority: {{Created or Updated_1.current.priority}}. Examine the parent for more details.^assignment_group={"display":"ContractSync Fulfillers","value":"8b03134d9f7302107f4489554524abdb","sys_id":"8b03134d9f7302107f4489554524abdb"}^state=1^short_description=Prepare Contract for approval^due_date={{fd_transform:829287d4-d422-4af2-a0c6-8f8dfc595dc2}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Contract state to Closed incomplete.
Notificate the Requester that the Contract request is rejected.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2 - Create Record➛...➛First name,

Unfortunately your 2 - Create Record➛...➛Contract type Contract is rejected by your Manager 2 - Create Record➛...➛Name or Flow Variables➛Reviewers name.

 

 Your Contract maybe still be approved in the future.

 

Best regards, Flow Variables➛Service desk name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Make Contract active = true.
Update Configuratiom item Reserved to true.
Update Contract State to Closed complete.
Wait for Contract request state is In progress.
Ask for approval to Contract Reviewer Group and Dependent Manager.
Notificate the Requester that the Contract request is approved and completed.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 3 - Create Record➛...➛First name,

Your 3 - Create Record➛...➛Contract type Contract is successfully approved by your Manager 3 - Create Record➛...➛Name and Flow Variables➛Reviewers name.

Your  Contract will start by: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Start date and will end by 3 - Create Record➛...➛End date.

 

Other Contract informations:  

Automatic renewal present: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Automatic renewal

Configuration items provided: 3 - Create Record➛...➛Configuration items

 

If your Contract provide Configuration Items then you will receive an email with their credentials.

 

 Best regards, Flow Variables➛Service desk name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send an Email with Error Code and Message to the ContractSync Admin group and ContractSync Creator.

sys_variable_value.value: An ERROR occurred in Contract Request fulfillment flow

Contract Request fulfillment flow ERROR:

  • Code: 15 - Top Level Catch➛...➛Code
  • Message: 15➛...➛Message

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get current Approval record.
Bind Contract Request and relative Approval.
Update Contract state to ready for approval and bind Contract Request to relative current Contract record.
Log (INFO) that the Contract was activated.
Log (ERROR) that an error was occurred.
